title: vivo V3 Max Review
description: Ingat GADGET, ingat DROIDLIME...!Spesifikasi vivo V3Max:Harga: Rp4.999.000CPU: 8-core Snapdragon 652RAM: 4 GBStorage: 32 GBOS: Android 5.1.1Kamera: 13 MP & 8 MPLayar: IPS 5,5 inci (1.920 x 1.080 piksel)Baterai: 3.000 mAhSensor: Accelerometer, proximity, gyroscope, compass, barometer, fingerprintUSB OTG: YaScreen-on-time: 4 jamAnTuTu Benchmark 6.0: 69 ribu poinGame di video ini:Hitman: Sniper https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.squareenixmontreal.hitmansniperandroidTalent: Imelda LianziReview by: DroidLime (Romi Hidayat)FB: DroidLime https://www.facebook.com/droidlimeTwitter: @droidlime https://twitter.com/droidlimeGPlus: DroidLime https://plus.google.com/+DroidlimeInstagram: https://instagram.com/droidlime/LINE@: @droidlime
